pageTitle: Singers.com: Minnesota Boychoir: Rise Up Singing

textAfterTable: Directed by Mark S. Johnson Rise Up Singing, features the combined choirs of the Minnesota Boychoir. This release includes sacred, classical, secular, folk and contemporary choral music. The gospel selection "He Has the Power" features guest soloist Lanell Lightfoot. A nice mixture of material from Kodaly's "See The Gypsies", Stephen Foster's "Gentle Annie", Mary Goetz's "When Children Sing" and a lovely medley called "South African Suite". 7193C | 1 CD | $15.98 | | Choral | Male | United States Related: Boys Choirs CDs Printer friendly version General Search | Choral Search | Arrangement Search | Instructional Search | Solo Voice Search | Barbershop Search For More of The Primarily A
